casebody.data:
Kenneth D. BOBBITT
v.
Danny SAFRIT, Administrator, Alexander Correctional Institution
Roy A. Cooper, III, Attorney General, State of North Carolina. No. 667PA03-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Staples Hughes, Durham, for Bobbitt, Kenneth D. Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 17th of October 2014 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 17th of October 2014 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
